attributes.action: carers to be acknowledged and paid for the service they provide!
attributes.background: I want the government to acknowledge that being a Carer is not an easy job by any means and you do spend a lot more time out of the hours you get paid making sure your clients are ok and comfortable so I  would like this to be acknowledged and awarded a decent pay.

rejection.details:
We understand that you're concerned about carers' pay and recognition of how important they are, but we're not sure what you'd like the UK Government or Parliament to do. 

You might like to sign and share this petition:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/316909

You could also start a new petition explaining what you'd like the UK Parliament or Government to do acknowledge the importance of carers.
